basics.name: Avina
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: A New York residing, Master's student at New York University, majoring in Computer Science. I am a passionate learner and a quick adapter to new technologies. I am looking for job opportunities in USA, to apply my skills and knowledge in the real world.

courses: Design and Analysis of Algorithms, Operating Systems, Machine Learning, Information, Security, and Privacy, Cloud Computing, Principles of Database Systems, Big Data, Software Engineering

Digital Logic and Design, Applications of Differential and Difference Equations, Java Programming, Computer Architecture and Organization, Database Management Systems, Operating Systems, Microprocessor and Interfacing, Data Structures and Algorithms, Design and Analysis of Algorithms, Theory of Computation, Software Engineering, Internet and Web Programming, Parallel and Distributed Computing, Basic Electrical and Electronics Engineering, Discrete Mathematics and Graph Theory, Applied Linear Algebra, Artificial Intelligence, Web Mining, Cyber Security, Digital Forensics, Virtualization, Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing, Human Computer Interaction

work.name: PharmEasy
work.summary: Designing, developing, and delivering scalable and robust solutions for the online pharmacy platform. {Java, Kotlin, Spring Boot, Microservices, Kafka, Redis, MySQL, MongoDB, AWS, Docker, Kubernetes}
highlights: Certificate of Recognition - Supply Chain Platform Engineering

work.name: Indian Space Research Organisation - Space Applications Centre (ISRO)
work.summary: Developed a novel system for Incidence Angle Normalization of ENVISAT Ocean satellite images {Python, Satellite image processing, OpenCV, NumPy, Matplotlib, Pandas, Pytorch}
highlights: Funded by ISRO and a Research paper under the guidance of Dr. Santhi V under review

work.name: Amilcar Technologies
work.summary: Redesigned and recreated the company official website alongside a team of developers {HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, PHP, MySQL, JQuery}

volunteer.summary: Volunteering as mentor on Expertrons guiding students and professionals on their career path
highlights: Coordinated the 'Machine Learning' workshop in the national symposium Synergy '18

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
